function.name: cooking_startCourse
function.description: This function is used to start a specific cooking course on a cooking appliance.

location.description: The location where the device is located.

room.description: The room where the device is located.

device.description: The name or type of the device to be controlled.

mode.description: The mode to start the cooking course.

temperatureUnit.description: The unit of temperature to be used.

temperature.description: The temperature to start the cooking course.

timer.description: The duration of the cooking course.

compartment.description: The predefined compartment to start the cooking course on.
